meanings.sent1: My dad works at a company that sells shoes.
meanings.sent2: The new company in town is known for its delicious pastries.
meanings.sent3: I heard a funny joke about a company that only sells invisible products.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a company of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The company's logo was as recognizable as a bright red stop sign.

meanings.definition: A group of people gathered together for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: Our hiking company reached the mountain peak just before sunset.
meanings.sent2: The company of volunteers worked tirelessly to clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: The company of friends at the party made sure everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky formed a company of twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The company of birds chirping in the trees created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being with another or others.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the company of my siblings during the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The company of strangers on the bus made the long journey more interesting.
meanings.sent3: The company of clouds in the sky seemed to be having a playful race.
meanings.sent4: The moon in the night sky kept the company of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The company of waves crashing against the shore was both soothing and invigorating.
